items.content_html: Authify is a lightweight authentication library designed for MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) applications. It provides an easy-to-use solution for implementing JWT-based authentication, user session management, and middleware integration to secure your APIs.
items.title: Ghulam-Ali-Khan/Authify: Authify is a lightweight authentication library designed for MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) applications. It provides an easy-to-use solution for implementing JWT-based authentication, user session management, and middleware integration to secure your APIs.

items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
